description:
From our law office in Kansas City, Missouri, the attorneys at Wendt Law Firm P.C. provide exceptional representation and support to clients throughout the surrounding areas of Kansas and Missouri who suffered an injury or lost a loved one as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions.

Focusing solely on personal injury law, we have more than 17 years of combined legal experience. During this time, we have successfully handled thousands of claims arising from motor vehicle accidents, defective products, medical malpractice, nursing home abuse, dangerous property conditions and other preventable tragedies. To date, we have recovered more than $100 million in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients, including more than $89 million against major pharmaceutical companies, earning our reputation as one of the region's leading personal injury law firms.

As further evidence of our success, our lawyers have earned top attorney designations from our peers, and our law firm has received numerous positive testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients. No matter how complex your needs or how challenging your situation, you can rely on us for aggressive advocacy inside and outside of the courtroom. We will remain with you until the end to address your questions and concerns while delivering the highly compassionate counsel you need at this difficult and uncertain time in your life.

To find out more about how Wendt Law Firm P.C. can best assist you and your family and increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation you deserve, you can call our law office or visit our website to schedule a free initial consultation.
